column4: hey guys, how do you securely delete data so that it can not be recovered?
i dont want to wipe my hardddrive
just a file on my desktop

it's a tricky problem, as modern filesystems use journalling:  replacing the files contents doesn't actually mean that the contents of the file aren't anywhere else on the drive.  In some cases, it's straightforward, but it depends on the history/use of the file
